attributes.action: stop Haywood High School and Engineering College being part of the proposed school closures in Stoke on Trent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In recent informal proposals it has been suggested that Haywood High School and Engineering College will close.
The Parents/Teachers Friends Association is totally opposed to this for the following reasons.
(1) This is a caring school with an excellent ethos.
(2) It is an over subscribed because people choose this school.
(3) It will leave a gaping hole in the community.
(4) Ofsted judged this school to be good with outstanding features.
